example.eg: He poured water into a clear glass.
example.egtrans: 他把水倒进一只透明的杯子里。

example.eg: The message of the new law is clear.
example.egtrans: 新法令含义明确。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 明确的, 清晰的, 清晰的

example.eg: The truth is clear to us.
example.egtrans: 事实清楚地摆在我们面前。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 清楚的, 明白的, 明显的

example.eg: This television has a clear picture.
example.egtrans: 这台电视机的画面很清晰。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 清晰的, 分辨率高的

example.eg: The students have a clear view of the teacher.
example.egtrans: 学生们的视线不受遮挡，能够清晰看到老师。

example.eg: They swam in clear mountain pools.
example.egtrans: 他们在清澈的山间水池里游泳。

example.eg: You're so lucky to have such beautiful, clear skin!
example.egtrans: 你真幸运，能有这样美丽动人、明净无瑕的肌肤！

example.eg: He had surgery to clear the blocked artery.
example.egtrans: 他做了手术，疏通动脉堵塞。

example.eg: When the family had finished eating, Tom's mother asked him to clear the table.
example.egtrans: 全家人吃完饭后，汤姆的妈妈让他收拾餐桌。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 收拾, 清理, 整理

example.eg: The ploughs have to clear snow from the roads.
example.egtrans: 得用除雪机把路上的雪清掉。

example.eg: The sky is clear today.
example.egtrans: 今天天空晴朗无云。

example.eg: That is a nice, clear, blue colour.
example.egtrans: 那是一种美丽、明净的蓝色。

example.eg: Her eyes were a clear blue.
example.egtrans: 她的眼睛是纯净的蓝色。

example.eg: The soldiers are clear about their mission.
example.egtrans: 士兵们清楚自己的任务是什么。

example.eg: The police officer does his job with a clear conscience.
example.egtrans: 那名警察问心无愧地做好自己的本职工作。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 问心无愧的, 清白的

example.eg: I always leave my yoga class with a clear mind.
example.egtrans: 上完瑜伽课后，我总是心境宁和。

example.eg: You'll make a clear twenty thousand.
example.egtrans: 你会净赚两千块。

example.eg: The message was clear; no one had scrambled it.
example.egtrans: 信息没有加密，没人倒换过频率。

example.eg: The away team is now 20 points clear.
example.egtrans: 客队现在领先20分。

example.eg: It's hard to get a loan that's clear of interest.
example.egtrans: 想要得到一笔不付利息的贷款很困难。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 不欠账的, 无债务的

example.eg: Keep clear of him. He's dangerous.
He pushed through the opposing players and out into the clear, ready to receive the ball.
example.egtrans: 他推开对方选手，冲到场中空地，准备接球。

example.eg: The sky cleared after the rain.
example.egtrans: 雨后天晴。

example.eg: The check will clear in five days.
example.egtrans: 支票五天后兑现。

example.eg: Just relax, and let your mind clear.
example.egtrans: 放松点，把你的头脑放空。

example.eg: I'll serve dinner, and you clear when they have finished eating.
example.egtrans: 晚餐我来上菜，他们吃完后你来收拾桌子。

example.eg: We will clear the land, and then plant new grass.
Clear the water with a fine mesh filter.
The police cleared the street of onlookers.
Let's clear our lines and resume fishing.
The runner cleared all of the hurdles.
example.egtrans: 赛跑选手跨过了所有的跨栏。

example.eg: The plane cleared the treetops.
The top of the trailer cleared the bridge with inches to spare.
The lobster boat cleared the shoals safely.
We cleared the air with a filter.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 把…过滤干净, 使…干净

example.eg: The court cleared the suspect of all charges.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 洗清…嫌疑, 宣判…无罪

example.eg: The security office cleared the visitors to enter.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 批准, 授权, 给予…许可

example.eg: Anne cleared a million in income this year.
example.egtrans: 安妮今年净收入一百万。

example.eg: This final cheque will clear your debt.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 偿清（债务）, 使解除债务

example.eg: The bank cleared your check, so the purchase is now official!
example.egtrans: 银行承兑了你的支票，因此现在购买正式生效。

example.eg: We will meet you after you clear customs.
There was a fire alarm and everyone had to clear the building.
example.egtrans: 火灾警报响起，所有人都从大楼撤离。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 撤离, 腾出, 清空

example.eg: Kate cleared her schedule so that she could visit her mother in hospital.
example.egtrans: 凯特取消了原来的日程安排，好去医院探望母亲。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 清空（日程安排）, 推掉（日程安排）

example.eg: After the meal, Fiona began clearing away the plates.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 消散，散去, 清除走（以腾出空间），（饭后）收拾碗筷

example.eg: Josie's little brother was annoying her, so she told him to clear off.
The fire alarm went off and everybody had to clear out.
example.egtrans: 火警警报响起，所有人都必须离开。

example.eg: My landlord's given me a week to clear out of my flat.
example.egtrans: 我的房东给了我一周的时间搬离公寓。

example.eg: Anita cleared out all the closets in preparation for the move.
example.egtrans: 为搬家做准备，安妮塔把所有壁橱都清空了。

example.eg: Maria told the children to clear their toys up when they'd finished playing with them.
example.egtrans: 玛利亚让孩子们玩儿完玩具后要整理好它们。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 整理, 清洁, 清扫

example.eg: I was hoping that you could clear something up for me.
example.egtrans: 我有件事想请你澄清一下。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 消除（嫌疑等）, 澄清, 说清楚

example.eg: The doctor told me the rash would clear up in about six weeks.
example.egtrans: 医生告诉我红疹会在大约六周内痊愈。

example.eg: The weather soon cleared up and the sun came out.
example.egtrans: 天气很快就变好了，太阳也出来了。

example.eg: When the fire drill was done, the principal gave the all clear.

dsense.name: all clear
dsense.guideword: figurative (signal to go ahead) (表示可以继续前进)

dsense.name: clear as day, as clear as day

example.eg: Despite the police spokesman's denial, the onlooker's video showed the policeman's unprovoked aggression, as clear as day.

dsense.name: clear as day, as clear as day

example.eg: It was clear as day to me that the Prime Minister had no intention of honouring his promises.
example.egtrans: 总理根本不想兑现承诺，这点对我来说一目了然。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 清清楚楚的，一看就懂的

example.eg: Now that I've returned her the favour at last, I have a clear conscience.
If you clear off the dining table, we can play cards there.
Mike cleared the papers off his desk.
example.egtrans: 麦克把自己桌子上的纸张收拾干净了。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 将…从…表面清除, 把...上的...收拾干净, 将…从…清理出去

example.eg: These food containers are made of clear plastic.
He carries his identification card in a clear plastic case to protect it from wear.
If you could just clear some space on your desk, I'll set the computer up there.

dsense.name: clear some space on your calendar

example.eg: Could you clear some space on your calendar to spend some time with her?
After our dreadful argument the day before, he telephoned me to apologise and to clear the air, after which I felt much happier.
The machine is designed to clear the air of dust and pollen.
Before they could even think about building shelters, they had to clear the ground of hundreds of large rocks.
I must clear the snow from the driveway so I can drive my car to work.
They took out the old walnut grove to clear the way for the bypass.
City council approval cleared the way for the new mall.
It's no use panicking - only clear thinking and cool heads will see us through this crisis.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 清晰的思维, 思维清晰

example.eg: You'll have to sue that slanderer in court in order to clear your name.
The butler respectfully cleared his throat.
It's a clear-cut case of fraud.

dsense.name: clear-cut [sth]⇒
dsense.guideword: (forestry: cut all trees in an area)

example.eg: Clear-cutting on steep slopes can cause erosion.
example.egtrans: 砍光陡坡上的树可能导致水土流失。

example.eg: He wasn't able to fool his clear-sighted mother.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 头脑清楚的, 明白的

example.eg: You don't need to decrypt it; the message is already in cleartext!
The chief executive made his opposition to the proposal crystal clear.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 清晰明了的, 非常清楚的

example.eg: His explanation was crystal clear.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 非常明白, 十分清楚

example.eg: She swam in the crystal-clear water.
example.egtrans: 她在清澈的水中游泳。//山里的水很纯净。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 纯净的，清澈的，透明如水晶的

example.eg: The fox was in the clear after it swam across a wide river.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 畅行无阻的, 脱离危险的
无债务的, 无负担的

example.eg: The suspect was able to prove his alibi, so he's in the clear.

dsense.name: keep clear
dsense.guideword: written (on sign: stay at a distance)

trans_examp.trans_cn: 不要与…接近, 离…远点, 避免与…接触

example.eg: I hear you loud and clear; we'll do the project your way.
The voters sent a loud and clear message in favor of reforms.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 清楚明白的, 一清二楚的

example.eg: Let me make clear that I don't object to the person, only to his policies.
Sandra likes to make it clear who's boss.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 把话说清楚, 明确表示

dsense.name: make it clear, make it clear that

example.eg: I'd like to make it clear to the council that I do not approve of this decision.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 向某人解释某事, 向某人澄清某事

example.eg: You must never do that again – have I made myself clear?

dsense.name: plain sailing (UK), plane sailing (UK), clear sailing (US)

trans_examp.trans_cn: 进展顺利, 一帆风顺

example.eg: Use the button on the right to switch between plain text and the WYSIWYG editor.
Stay clear of him, he's a bad influence!

trans_examp.trans_cn: 避开, 避免, 躲开

example.eg: Stay clear of the fire line; only fire fighters are allowed past the yellow tape.
Steer clear of that guy - he's trouble.
I try to steer clear of fried foods.
I resigned immediately and left the office with a clear conscience.
